sentence.Network_en: Cost and productiveness is the standard of measuring the management performance.
sentence.Network_cn: 成本与效率是其绩效的衡量标准.

sentence.Network_en: Fertilizer: Natural or artificial substance containing the chemical elements that improve growth and productiveness of plants.
sentence.Network_cn: 肥料: 含有促进植物生长和增产的化学元素的天然或人造物质.

sentence.Network_en: The cause of the productiveness of these operations not merely that division, but essentially this union.
sentence.Network_cn: 这类活动之所以具有生产性,不单单是由于“划分”, 主要还是由于“联合”.
